meta.core_mechanic: Players move patch tokens across an 8x8 grid by selecting a patch and sliding it along a straight line into an empty slot, with taps or drags used to place patches.

rules.text: MUST define deterministic, replayable actions with explicit input/output for each action.
AI MUST make a move within 2 seconds of its turn starting.
AI with difficulty 'easy' MUST use a simple, deterministic heuristic.
AI with difficulty 'medium' MUST use a moderate-depth search strategy.
AI with difficulty 'hard' MUST use an advanced look-ahead strategy with pruning.

properties.grid: 2D array of cells with occupantId|null and patch type info

actions.name: player_move
actions.result: Apply mechanics.move_validation and mechanics.capture; update game state; switch to AI; check end conditions
actions.condition: current_player == 1 AND game.status == playing AND move is legal per mechanics.move_validation

actions.name: ai_move
actions.result: AI calculates move using algorithm; apply mechanics.move_validation and mechanics.capture; update state; switch to human; check end conditions

actions.name: restart
actions.result: Reset all state to initial values

setup.initial_placement: Each player starts with a small reserve of patches placed in their home area; starting patches are visible to both players.

capture.result: No capture mechanics in this patch-based grid.

scoring.winner_determination: player with higher accumulated points (patches placed); draw if equal

turn_flow.extra_turn_conditions: end game after two consecutive passes

validity_checks: path from selected patch to destination is a straight line and unobstructed
destination is within the 8x8 grid bounds
move respects line-slide rules (patch slides along a straight path until destination)

validation_algorithm.name: path_check
steps: Verify all intermediate cells are empty.
If valid, return is_valid=true and a move-preview object.
If invalid, return is_valid=false and error feedback.

acceptance.then: Captured pieces update exactly as defined
acceptance.given: A valid capture exists per game rules

acceptance.then: AI uses simple algorithm, makes valid move within 2s
AI MUST block human's winning move

win.check_logic: End after all turns or when scoring determines human ahead at end of round

draw.check_logic: End when no legal moves remain and scores are tied

lose.check_logic: End after all turns or when scoring determines AI ahead at end of round
